hero.title: Coding AI In Your IDE
hero.subtitle: Experience the future of software development with AI-powered coding assistance. Write better code faster, debug intelligently, and transform complex projects into manageable tasks. Your development workflow, supercharged.

productFeatures.title: What is Claude IDE
productFeatures.description: Claude IDE is a powerful AI coding assistant embedded directly in your terminal and VS Code, bringing AI-assisted development right to your fingertips.

intelligentUnderstanding.title: Intelligent Code Understanding
intelligentUnderstanding.description: Understands your entire codebase instead of isolated snippets, makes coordinated changes across files, and offers suggestions that truly fit your project.

worksWhereYouWork.title: Works Where You Work
worksWhereYouWork.description: Lives right inside your terminal and IDE with no context switching, deeply integrated with VS Code and JetBrains.

seamlessIntegration.title: Seamless Integration
seamlessIntegration.description: Competitive pricing that makes advanced AI coding assistance accessible to more developers without worrying about high costs.

useCases.title: What Could You Do With Claude IDE?

codeOnboarding.title: Quick Code Familiarization
codeOnboarding.description: Claude Code analyzes and explains complete codebases in seconds. Through intelligent search, it automatically grasps project architecture and dependencies without requiring manual context file selection.

issueToPR.title: From Issues to PRs
issueToPR.description: Say goodbye to constant tool switching. Claude Code deeply integrates with GitHub, GitLab, and command-line tools to manage the complete workflowâ€”reading issues, writing code, executing tests, and submitting PRsâ€”all within your terminal.

powerfulEdits.title: Execute Powerful Edits
powerfulEdits.description: With deep understanding of your codebase and dependencies, Claude Code performs powerful multi-file edits that ensure accuracy and functionality.

items.name: Alice, Frontend Engineer

lite.name: Lite
lite.description: For students and hobbyists. Entry-level access with ~10M tokens per month.

pro.name: Pro

team.name: Team

footer.description: AI-powered coding assistant that transforms your development workflow. Write better code faster with intelligent suggestions and seamless IDE integration.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about Claude IDE and get started with AI-powered coding assistance.

items.question: How to use claude ide?
items.answer: After installing Node.js and the official Claude Code plugin, simply configure the API key and API base URL in the terminal. The setup takes only a minute. We also provide a self-testing interface, allowing you to test the connection before subscribing. We offer a wide range of subscription plans with generous monthly service quotas to meet various needs.

items.question: What model does claude ide use?
items.answer: claude ide is built on top of Claude Opus 4.1 model.

items.question: What is this model suitable for?
items.answer: Claude-IDE is an efficient intelligent development and automation tool that integrates seamlessly with your existing IDE and development tools, without requiring any changes to your workflow. It supports multiple programming languages and helps developers quickly generate, debug, and optimize code. Additionally, Claude-IDE can collaborate with common command-line tools (like Git) and MCP servers (such as GitHub), extending its capabilities and making your development process even more efficient.

items.question: What if I don't use up my subscription quota?
items.answer: If you don't use up your quota, you can share it with friends or team members. We support creating multiple API keys under one account, and you can set individual quotas and expiration times for each API key. Lite members can create up to 3 API keys, Pro members can create up to 10, and Team members can create up to 50 API keys.

items.question: Which OS and programming languages are supported?
items.answer: It supports Windows/Mac/Linux and all common languages, including Python, JavaScript/TypeScript, Java, C++, Go, Rust, and more.

items.question: Does it support cache read?
items.answer: Yes, cache read is supported. When calculating the consumed tokens, input tokens from cache read will be multiplied by a discount factor. In addition, different membership levels enjoy different token consumption discounts: Pro members get a 10% reduction, while Team members get a 15% reduction.

tutorial.title: Getting Started with Our Service
tutorial.subtitle: Follow these 5 simple steps to start using our AI-powered development tools

step1.title: Quick Start Guide
step1.description:
Install Node.js 18.0.0 or higher and Claude Code CLI tool globally. Get up and running in just a few minutes.

Prerequisites:
â€¢ Node.js - Install Node.js version 18.0.0 or higher
  node --version (v18.0.0 or higher)
â€¢ Claude Code - Install Claude Code CLI tool globally
  npm install -g @anthropic-ai/claude-code

step2.title: Test with API Key
step2.description: Use our test API key to verify everything works correctly and learn how to make your first API call

step3.title: Subscribe to a Plan
step3.description: Choose the subscription plan that best fits your needs and complete the payment process to unlock full features

step4.title: Create Your API
step4.description: Generate your API keys and learn how to integrate our services into your development workflow

step5.title: Start Building
step5.description: Begin using our AI tools to accelerate your development process and unlock new possibilities
